reviews.review_msg: Prof is super smart and approachable! He knows his stats very well and is great at encouraging students to do well in the course. Always willing to help at office hours and through email. The TA on the other hand tries but most times not clear in his explanations. The course was a pleasant introduction to statistics for me. Thank you Shiv!
his teaching style is ok, but it is sloooow. i hate going to class.
